documents.document:
b0red..

well. me & chloe are sittin here haha, oh god fun friggin time watching mad house at sams, lmfao.. that was funny.. anywho, well yeah we should go to bed soon tired.. well see yah!

doin my haIr..

hEyyY! well right now i am striatening my hair.. gotta go & get some money! $ lmao.. gettin my ipod nano thursday!! yesss.. well chloes comin over again soon, we are going to do our make-up and take a bunch of pictures.. well i better finish getting ready, see yah soon!
Love you

hocKey game?

hey.. well im decideing if i should go to Brady's hockey game.. if he even has one lol.. me & Chloe might go, but i gotta wait for my cheeseburger to be done! lol.. well i went to Chloes b-ball game, just got back so boring.. well not really .. lol.. well anyways i better go, see yah!

Love You xXx

hhm..

hey .. well im waitin to go to teensWOOWOO! .. well im talking to Tanner & Chloe right now. i can't wait till tomorrow cause im getting my pink ipod nano, and my battery for my camera cause its like not working at all, and i hope its just the battery thats fucked, haha.. anywho i better go, see yah!
.love molLy.

ipod :D

hey! .. well i finally got my pink iPod nano!.. it was the last 4GB one there!.. anywho, im downloadin iTunes now. so i better go, cause this is slowing it up!, bye! .molLy. xXx

got bacKk from the rodd.

hey! .. well i just got bacj from the rodd .. with katie, jenn, colby & david. it was funn! .. haha, anywho i am goin to the bantom aaa game at 8.15 i think:S.. lmao, well i better go, see yah!
love .molLy. xXx

hello:)..

well..its like 12:34am.. .. 1234!!! lmao, anywho haha.. katie & jenn are here .. well can't friggin wait till later like at 2:00 PM we are going to andreas!!! woohoo.. well we are staying up till then, we are gonna take pictures & stuff.. and yeah, we still have to watch that movie, well anyway, i better go, Katie is going to make a facebox!.. so see yah! xXx love .molLy.

... just got back from school ...

hey!.. well i just got home from school, wish it was another snow day today!.. anywhoo yesterday was.. and tomorrow probly will cause theres supposed to be another storm. haha.. well i better go, see you xXx love molLyy

Andrea:)

well.. Jennifer & Andrea are here!.. they are watching zoey 101, haha. well i stayed at jessie's with andrea last night.. lmfao WOO lmbo. that was frickin sweet. poor chats we had with Matt, can hardly remember anything.. anywhoo that was frickin great!.. well anywhoo i better go, see yah byeeee

bored muchhh? haha

heylo. lol, well i just got back from the girls 'a' basketball game .. well i am soon going to eat! yes. im fatttt lmao. anywhoo i better goo .. ohh yeah & the bball game was pretty good, not sure who one though.. lmao. didn't really watch and it was against miscouche. Love YahhhxXx

hhm, home from the rinkk

haha. hey, well i just got back from the rink. haha god that was a BLAST. yeah i know lame word haha but yeah. .. anywhoo there was me, kendra, andela, jenny, coltin, curtis, colby, jesse, and this johnathan kid. lol not sure how to spell but anyway.... haha... well anyway we took like a pile of pictures. haha that was so funn. anyway i better go. see yah. byeee xXx
~

home from school ...

hey!.. well i just got home from school. what a longgg day lol , well yesterday was pretty funn, & THE DAY BEFORE (saturday, febuary 3rd) lol, when we went to the rodd and colby, robby, brandon & parker were there, holy that was funn!! .. well im eatin cookies and milk right now . well today is amy gallants birthday .. miss you. rip hu. well i better go .. seeee yea. xXx
